extendedInfo.description: Color me ABC is a fun way to learn ABC alphabet letter with symphony of colors for your preschool aged kid. This child friendly kids ABC letters coloring book invite and delight the children to get familiar with English alphabets, which is the main educational goal behind this app. You can also teach your baby about naming colors and letters correctly while he is engaged coloring them. This clean and focused kid coloring app is designed such that it is inviting and nourishing for those kids who intend to start learning ABCs. My ABC Coloring Book is a color splash kids alphabet game of ABC for kids all alphabets included in it.â How To Playâ Scroll down the images to select one of your choiceâ You can view it now on your coloring screen/coloring spaceâ Select a suitable colorâ Now color the image carefullyâ Save the image to your SD Card/Phone Memory or Image Gallery when you are doneâ Itâs fully featured withâ¦â Choose from 3 sizes of basic coloring tool brush for your kid painting art skillsâ¬ of color touch effectsâ Use the free tool eraser to rub off the unwanted color flashlightâ¬ from the pictureâ Let your child grow his creative instincts through this fun game with 20 multi color brushes from a range of colors and unique designs.â While your child play around with this interactive touching coloring book, a distraction-free music plays behind to boost up his  creative thoughtsâ You have messed up and donât feel like erasing it all? Press CLEAR ALL and the app do the cleaning job itself.â¬â We have replaced the old method of tap and paint; with the new and improved finger painting technique. Swipe across the screen where you want to color while the-machine-fills it for you. â Save the flashing sketch your fun brain kid has colored, to the SD card/Gallery â What more you can add to itâ¦While your fun brain kid is busy forming letters with magical colors, you can help him recognizing letters and teach alphabet letter sounds accompanied by pronunciation of the letters as well. We are sure that he would learn easily while having fun. The color selection and the art of coloring with unique color effects play a distinct role in the development of cognitive, tactile and fine motor skills of your pre-school kid. We have replaced the old method of tap and paint; with the new and improved finger drawing technique.I play this too! And I am sure your toddler would have fun to color the ABC toddler alphabets. So get it on your device now to enjoy this kid coloring delightful game. Tell us about your experiences and suggestions to help us keep working on more teaching apps for kids.***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: Ads Galour!!
reviews.comment: Ads never stop coming! Ever since I got this app, I\'ve received an ad from it at least 5 times a day AND from other different places. Very bad idea to get this app. And the sound when your child is coloring is highly annoying. My phone has to go on vibrate the few times my kids play with this.
reviews.author: Kimberly Pangelinan
